instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01521: What is 820-01521? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 no power
threads.message:
configurator2 is saying error 4013
No short on nand voltages 
PP3V3 G3H
<SIGNAL>PPVDDCPU_AWAKE</SIGNAL>
PPVDDCPUSRAM_AWAKE
<SIGNAL>PPOV82_SLPDDR</SIGNAL>
PP1V8 SLPS2R
PP1V1 SLPS2R
<SIGNAL>PPOV9_SLPDDR</SIGNAL>
PPBUS G3H
The Standby Voltage of T2 Chip

 I've all these voltages present, and the system is not coming up. IR camera indicates that T2 and NAND are awake, but the processor is not.
Did both Revive and Restore with AC2
It returns the error code 4013

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 no power
threads.message:
Any history available?
Check for liquid sign on audio board/flex and connectors.
